txt.en: Jealous of the wealth and status of the Longbeards -- particularly since Durin's Folk reclaimed the Lonely Mountain -- the Dourhands have plotted to usurp their position as the leaders of the Dwarves of the Blue Mountains for many years now.

It is unclear exactly when the Dourhands first made contact with the emissaries of Angmar, but the influence of the Iron Crown has become clear in recent years.\n\nYou have defeated many of your traitorous kin, but thanks to their new allies, their resources are greater than anyone had imagined.
